altername_name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 73: The Invader: Space Invaders 1500
name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 73: The Invaders: Space Invaders 1500
overview: Simple 1500 Series vol. 73 - The Invaders - Space Invaders 1500 features the originals arcade machines (with and without background artwork) and a new 3d mode, called Space Invaders 3D that features a new graphics 3d engine, a first person view and other camera angles and vibration function for all the modes modes. Game Modes: - Classic: Play all the different classic arcade machines. - Space Invaders 3D - Vs Mode: Play in a split screen against another human player. - Time Attack Mode: Try to clear the stage in the less time possible, each time the players died the time is increased in 30 seconds.
